rules.name: Input Ownership Rights
rules.description: Customer retains all rights to AI input data
rules.rule_text: Customer must retain all right, title, and interest in and to all input data submitted to AI services.

rules.name: Output Ownership Rights
rules.rule_text: Customer must own all output generated by AI services. Provider must assign any rights in output to customer to the extent permitted by law.

rules.name: Model Training Restrictions
rules.description: Prohibition on using customer data for model training without permission
rules.rule_text: Provider must not use customer inputs or outputs to train any AI model unless explicitly permitted with identified training data and purposes.
exceptions: Unless explicitly permitted with defined training data and purposes

rules.name: Non-Training Improvement Rights
rules.description: Rights to use data for AI system improvement without training
rules.rule_text: Provider may use input and output to provide, maintain, develop, and improve the AI system, provided such usage does not constitute model training except as authorized.
exceptions: Must not constitute training except as explicitly authorized

rules.name: Regulated Industry Use Restrictions
rules.description: Requirements for human oversight in regulated industries
rules.rule_text: Customer must not use AI services for decision-making in regulated industries without proper human oversight and review in compliance with applicable laws.

rules.name: IP Rights Violation Prohibition
rules.description: Prohibition on using AI to violate intellectual property rights
rules.rule_text: Customer must not use AI services to violate, misappropriate, or infringe intellectual property or proprietary rights of others.

rules.name: Human Authorship Misrepresentation
rules.description: Prohibition on falsely claiming AI output was human-created
rules.rule_text: Customer must not falsely state that AI-generated output was created by a human.

rules.name: AI Accuracy Disclaimer
rules.description: Disclaimer about AI output accuracy and reliability
rules.rule_text: Agreement must acknowledge that AI-generated information may be incorrect or inaccurate, and AI services are not a substitute for human oversight.

rules.name: Output Similarity Disclaimer
rules.description: Disclaimer about potential similarity to other users' outputs
rules.rule_text: Provider must disclaim that output may resemble or duplicate content created for others, and does not guarantee uniqueness or non-infringement.

rules.name: IP Protection Disclaimer
rules.description: Disclaimer about intellectual property protection of AI output
rules.rule_text: Agreement must acknowledge that AI-generated output may not be protectable as intellectual property.

rules.name: Personal Data Compliance
rules.description: Compliance with data protection laws for personal data in inputs
rules.rule_text: Provider's obligations under applicable data protection laws regarding personal data in inputs must not be reduced or limited.

rules.name: Input Rights Warranty
rules.description: Customer warranty of rights to submit input
rules.rule_text: Customer must represent and warrant that it has all necessary rights to submit input to the AI services.

rules.name: AI Processing Authorization
rules.description: Customer authorization for provider to process inputs
rules.rule_text: Customer must authorize provider to copy, display, modify, distribute, and use input to the extent necessary to provide AI services.

metadata.description: Compliance rules derived from standard AI Addendum for assessing third-party AI service agreements
metadata.standard_version: Common Paper AI Addendum Standard Terms Version 1.0
